subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Mike and Bob Bryan kept the United States alive in the Davis Cup semifinal on Saturday when they defeated Mikhail Youzhny and Dmitri Tursunov of Russia in a pivotal doubles match.
snippet: Mike and Bob Bryan kept the United States alive in the Davis Cup semifinal on Saturday when they defeated Mikhail Youzhny and Dmitri Tursunov of Russia in a pivotal doubles match.
